author: Anonymous Comp
title: m08-abstract-fold-definition-starter.rkt issue with autograder
question:
When I use local to define the c1 function for the count test, it keeps returning an error: 
0%  of  16.7%  x      Test validity (matches problem statement): error evaluating test operands or expected results: eval:2:0: function call: 
expected a function after the open parenthesis, but found a part
  at: (define (c1 num cr rmr) (add1 rmr))
  in: (#%app (define (c1 num cr rmr) (add1 rmr)) (define (c2 rmr rnr) (+ rmr rnr)) (define b 0)).
What's even stranger is that the autograder passed when I defined c1 at top level instead of using local.
instructor_answer: I'm working on this very strange problem now.
